RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, thi s race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THANKGODNGREYHOUND sprinted to the front, well handled throughout to widen in the stretch run, PAINTSVILLE good position inside to far turn, angled out a bit, no match. HABITUS good position out of first turn, raced along evenly for show spot. JARED THE WARRIOR off rail run throughout with no late kick when needed. RIDGERUNNER never factored. NEVER SORRY always well back outrun. NEAP TIDE tried to keep up three wide to far turn, gave way readily. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the TURF course, all races run on the turf going forward will be hand time until further notice.

ENTRY.NAME: Thankgodngreyhound
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front, well handled throughout, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Ridgerunner
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored

ENTRY.NAME: Never Sorry
ENTRY.COMMENT: always well back outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Paintsville
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position inside to far turn, angled out a bit, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Jared the Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run throughout with no late kick when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Neap Tide
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up three wide to far turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Habitus
ENTRY.OWNER: Richmond Lewis Guinn Victoria and Shifflett Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position out of first turn, raced along evenly for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PALACE TEMPTATION tracked leader to the turn, ran on in earnest to the front, clear. SAMURAI WAY inside speed to the front, collared quarter pole, outkicked. STORMED OUT chased top pair throughout with no late response in the stretch. LEWIS AND CLARK always trailed.

ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, collared quarter pole, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Palace Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to the turn, ran on in earnest to the front, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lewis and Clark
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Stormed Out
ENTRY.OWNER: Born To Run Farm and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair throughout with no late response in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MATARASSI just off leader, took over into turn withstood challenge, held on. JAHEZ unhurried to the turn, rallied to challenge winner stretch denied. CARTOON CAPER speed to the front quickly, headed into the stretch weakened. TROY BOY trailed to the turn, passed one in the stretch run. ISLAND CURRENCY tried to keep up, gave in dropped far back galloped past wire.

ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried to the turn, rallied to challenge winner stretch denied

ENTRY.NAME: Troy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the turn, passed one in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Cartoon Caper

ENTRY.NAME: Island Currency
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up, gave in dropped far back galloped past wire

ENTRY.NAME: Matarassi

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 9, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REVERE NOTE hustled inside to the turn, took over to went clear in the stretch. BRENTSPENCE unhurried to the stretch, roused along coming on too late. SWELTER no speed to the turn from inside, rallied up rail for show spot. SHERLOCKED chased pace to the stretch, weakened in the final sixteenth. COUSIN ODELL close up the stretch, gave way readily from between horses late. ANDY WALKS WITH ME off rail run to the turn could not keep up in the stretch. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the TURF course, all races run on the turf going forward will be hand time until further notice. Acm

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside to the turn, took over went clear in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 9, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferre d).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAITHFUL KING just off leader to the turn, shifted out into the stretch run, kept on, edged off to the wire, good handling. SUPER BROTHER broke sharp outside, took up chase to the turn, rallied for place. POUR ME A DOUBLE speed inside to the stretch, weakened in the stretch for show. BAKER'S MAN always trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Pour Me a Double
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside to the stretch, weakened in the stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Faithful King
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the turn, shifted out for the drive, edged off

ENTRY.NAME: Baker's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp outside, took up chase to the turn, rallied for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 121 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIRT BOSS just off leaders to the ranged up outside into the stretch, dueled and held on gamely to the wire with a game effort. BRILLIANT MAN tardy from the gate, raced back to the stretch and rushed on too late at the wire. MR. BLUTARSKY good speed from the gate, pressed, led into stretch but weakened in the final sixteenth. PACIFIDERO brief speed from inside to turn and gave way readily. SWAYBACK JACK broke had a terrible from the gate and never menaced throughout. FIRST CHOICE dwelt at the start with no chance from that point.

ENTRY.NAME: First Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: dwelt at the start with no chance from that point

ENTRY.NAME: Pacifidero
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from inside to turn, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Swayback Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke terrible from the gate, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Brilliant Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: tardy from the gate, raced back to the stretch, rushed too late

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Blutarsky
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed from the gate, pressed, led into stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dirt Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: ranged up outside into the turn, dueled in stretch held on gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 9 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 9 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Races Whe re Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUANITA'S EXPRESS unhurried from the start with a steady run throughout to edge clear in the final stages under good handling to the wire. FAIRY CAKES (GB) speed to the front inside pace to the stretch but ou-kicked to the wire in a good effort. LINK TO DESTINY raced along evenly while never far back throughout while on for the show spot. FUTURE VICTORY no hurry from the gate, lagged back to far turn and only improved position in the late going. PARKER chased, pressed pace to far turn with nothing left in stretch. MIDNIGHT NIGHTMARE inside trip throughout with no late response when needed. T J MUNNINGS wide run first turn, crossed over, dueled to the half, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip throughout with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Link to Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly never far back throughout for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Future Victory
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry from the gate, lagged back to far turn improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Juanita's Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried from the start with a steady run to edge clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Ashleigh Stud Farm, Pamela Deegan & JoeDeegan

ENTRY.NAME: Fairy Cakes (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front inside pace to the stretch, oukicked to wire

ENTRY.NAME: T J Munnings

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 79. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 9, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RACEDAY ATTIRE just off leaders to turn, rallied out of the turn, cleared off in the stretch and held sway.to the wire. MY ANGELICA good position to the turn, three wide run into stretch for place. SUM KINDA PRETTY pressed to turn, short lead, kept on determined in the stretch but outgamed to the wire. HIGH SPEED inside run to deep stretch, angled out but leveled off in the late stages. TWIRLING RUTH speed inside to the turn but gave way in the stretch run. CAJUN DELIGHT awkward from the gate and never menaced throughout. WHISKEY SIS was through early but dropped back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate with no response when needed outside

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Ruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside to the turn, gave way in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: High Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to deep stretch, angled out but leveled off late

ENTRY.NAME: Raceday Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders to turn, rallied out of turn, cleared, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to turn, short lead, kept on determined outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sis
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: My Angelica
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the turn, three wide run into stretch for place
